References: Johnston et al., 1995, AJ, 110, 880; Stickel et al., 1989, A&AS, 80, 103; ATel #1898
Event Type: Sustained and increasing gamma-ray flux detection
Time: Sustained over the last two weeks with a peak flux on 22 October 2011 from 06:00 to 12:00 UT
Observatory: NASA and DOE in collaboration with scientific institutions from France, Italy, Japan, and Sweden
